alert.note: Alert for Christian; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 12:27PM CDT until April 24 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Christian County in central Illinois... Southeastern Sangamon County in central Illinois... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1226 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over White Oak, or 10 miles east of Virden, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pawnee around 1235 PM CDT. Bulpitt and Jeisyville around 1245 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Taylorville, Kincaid, Edinburg and Stonington. This includes Interstate 55 between mile markers 78 and 82. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
